params.description: API key for services call (reverse geocode service). The key "calcul" is used by default.
params.name: options.apiKey

params.description: use of ssl or not (default true, service requested using https protocol)
params.name: options.ssl

params.description: Specify if widget has to be collapsed (true) or not (false) on map loading. Default is true.
params.name: options.collapsed

params.description: resources for geocoding, by default : ["StreetAddress", "PositionOfInterest", "CadastralParcel"]. Possible values are : "StreetAddress", "PositionOfInterest", "CadastralParcel". Resources will be displayed in the same order in widget list.
params.name: options.resources

params.description: delimitations for reverse geocoding, by default : ["Point", "Circle", "Extent"]. Possible values are : "Point", "Circle", "Extent". Delimitations will be displayed in the same order in widget list.
params.name: options.delimitations

params.description: reverse geocode service options. see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~reverseGeocode Gp.Services.reverseGeocode()} to know all reverse geocode options.
params.name: options.reverseGeocodeOptions

params.description: Layer informations to be displayed in LayerSwitcher widget (only if a LayerSwitcher is also added to the map)
params.name: options.layerDescription

params.description: Layer title to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.title

params.defaultvalue: "Couche de saisie d'une zone de recherche pour la recherche inverse"
params.description: Layer description to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.description
